features: Sculpt Beautiful Brows: Shape, define, and fill in sparse or over tweezed brows with our ultra skinny Micro Brow Pencil; So precise it coats even the finest hairs with color for a natural looking finish
Super Skinny Tip: Our ultra-slim retractable tip draws extra fine lines so you can easily create the look of natural brow hairs
Line, Fill, Shape and Set: We've got everything you need to create beautiful eyebrows, including brow gels, precision brow pencils, pomades, powders, stylers, setters, tinted mascaras and more

Cruelty Free Cosmetics: We believe animals belong in our arms, not in a lab; All of our makeup is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty free brand; We don't test any of our products on animals

Discover NYX Professional Makeup: Try all of our professional makeup products today from eyeshadow, eyeliner, and false lashes to liquid lipstick, lip gloss, primer, concealer, setting sprays and eyebrow makeup
body.description: Build full beautiful brows with our ultra-thin Micro Brow Pencil. So precise it coats even the finest hairs with color for a natural-looking finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great way to fill and groom your brows
reviews.reviewText: The pencil is nice and thin, it does a great job of filling in the background of the gaps in my mature brows that have become sparse with age. Nice spoolie on one end and the thin fine retractable pencil on the other. The Glue is a great way to "Set" the brows once you have used the pen and spoolie to keep the look intact. Of course if you rub them too much, it will negate your initial grooming (which is expected), but I find that it has great holding power throughout the day for me. It's also a more subtle and soft look as opposed to dying your brows. I suppose that depends on what shade of pencil you get. I went for a more subtle matching shade to my natural brows.I do dye my brows from time to time, and this also works well to color in the background of the areas that just look a little thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars grey color perfect with silver hair
reviews.reviewText: delighted how easy to draw on and shape brows, brush smooths out any bumps or dark spots. am 65 years old and have been looking for a grey eyebrow pencil. brought a different expensive brand called "granite" (grey, right?) that made me look like Eddie Munster. others too brownish or reddish. so glad to find this pencil at a great price. don't have to waste anymore money looking for a winner. this is it. give it a try. would buy again, am buying three more so I don't run out. would give to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My makeup routine!
reviews.reviewText: The NYX Professional Makeup Micro Brow Pencil in Black has become my holy grail for achieving perfectly defined brows. This ultra-fine pencil allows for precise application, mimicking natural hair strokes and effortlessly filling in sparse areas. The black shade is bold without being overpowering, and the result is brows that are on point all day. The convenient spoolie on the other end is a game-changer for blending and shaping. If you're in search of an eyebrow pencil that combines precision, pigmentation, and staying power, NYX Micro Brow Pencil is a definite winner in my makeup routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy
reviews.reviewText: I usually apply a brown gel and brown powder when doing a full face makeup, but when in a hurry or not doing full face, this is a quick and easy alternative. Your browns are done in a few seconds. It won't last the whole day, but still a good option for filling your browns quickly on a daily basis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use to customize your brows
reviews.reviewText: My eyebrows are extremely light and small. I have tried so many things to get them to look fuller. Previously I was using a powder that worked but easily rubbed off and wasn't precise. I thought I would shoot my shot and use a pencil to draw what I wanted my eyebrows to look like. I was hesitant to use a pencil because I didn't want my eyebrows to look like they had literally been drawn on. I wanted that natural look.I tried this pencil out and immediately I was a fan. You can precisely draw how you want your brows to look. The attached spoolie blends everything so it doesn't look like actual drawn-on lines. I have received so many compliments on my eyebrows! I highly recommend this brow pencil! It lasts all day, even in the heat or with my busy toddler touching my face. I have even slept overnight with it on and it looks pretty good in the morning.My only small complaint is that I wish they had more dark-colored options. My hair is a light brown so I tried the color Taupe first- way too light and warm-toned for me. So I tried Espresso, which is the darkest brown color, and it still isn't that dark, more like a medium brown color with a warm undertone. But it still looks good! Just not as dark as I would like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best brow pencil
reviews.reviewText: This is my go to brow pencil. I am a natural red head, that leads more on the strawberry blonde. It is very hard to find a good color match for brows. All the ones geared for red heads are always too dark or too candy red. This blonde shade is a perfect match for me. It has golden/red undertones that match my hair so perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the same color
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the taupe color for years. I usually pick it up at a store near me, but this time I ordered it here. The 2 lines on the left are the taupe from the store, the 2 on the right are the taupe from here. As you can see, the ones on the right are much warmer, (and it’s much more noticeable in person) it makes my brows look orangey and doesn’t match my natural brow color as well. It’s weird because the pencil says taupe on it, but it’s like they switched out the actual little stick that’s inside for a different color or something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I live by this pencil.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this eyebrow color FOREVER in Ash Brown. It's never let me down. I've tried a few other drugstore brand pencils and they just don't compare. It glides on so smooth with a lot of pigment. No need to push really hard or go over one spot a million times!! The spoolie on the other end of the pencil is also extremely useful for blending and combing out the brows before applying!

Both pictures are while wearing the pencil in Grey, on otherwise clean face and with makeup.I went natural with my salt and pepper hair during pandemic, after a lifetime of coloring, and love it. However, as I quickly learned,cosmetic industry doesn't think people with grey hair wear makeup.As a result, I was trying to find a brow color or tint that works ever since. I went through dozens of ash browns, ash blonds, taupes - they all look brassy and tacky with grey hair. The couple of grey options I managed to find were in liquid form and look very dark, pretty much black, when dry.Unbelievably, this pencil in GREY actually works!Please NYX don't make it a limited time option, stick with it. I don't have it in me to spend another three years and tons of money searching for a replacement.(for some reason the review shows under Ash Brown instead of Grey, which I also purchased and it was another disappointment)
El tono black no es tan oscuro, si usas “ebony” de Anastasia este es muy similar en tono frío.

He estado usando este producto por años, desde que salió a la venta. Uso el color taupe y lo que me gusta es que el tono es cenizo, lo cual se parece mucho al color natural de mis cejas. Otras marcas tienen tonos más cálidos que en mí se ven como rojizos y artificiales. Otra cosa que me gusta es que no es demasiado cremoso, lo que permite tener un mejor control sobre la aplicación y que no quede demasiado recargado el color. Naturalmente tengo poco pobladas las cejas y los vellos son delgados, pero con este lápiz puedo rellenarlas y conseguir un aspecto muy natural sin que queden saturadas de producto ni se vean exageradas.
Me gusta ya lo había adquirido en otro color, sin embargo el color chocolate no me convence tanto ya que tiene un subtono muy rojizo es lo único por lo que no le pongo 5 estrellas

Da ich nur noch halbe Augenbrauen habe war ich immer auf der Suche nach einem halbwegs natürlich aussehenden Stift. Färben sieht total unnatürlich aus. Mit diesem Stift bin ich endlich fündig geworden. Er ist nicht zu weich und das Ergebnis sieht total natürlich aus. Für mich eine klare Kaufempfehlung!
